job_title: Homeless Resource Specialist in Madison, WI
pros: It's a rewarding experience to provide assistance to individuals struggling with homelessness, and resolve their day to day needs.
cons: When some of the homeless individuals patience has grown thin while waiting for their circumstances to change, thus displaying some angry behaviors.

pros: Porchlight provides over a thousand homeless and formerly homeless people with temporary shelter, permanent housing, and other services.
cons: Porchlight has grown quickly in the last twenty years, and management systems have not kept up with needs. This makes information difficult to access, and leads to confusion and conflict in operations.

pros: A truly rewarding position-working directly with the clients gives you a respect and understanding for their struggles .  It's a great experience to help them through their barriers to become independent.
cons: Frustrating when the clients do not follow their plan of action and revert back to old habits.
